name: Bunker Survival (made in 3 hours)
description:
I know there are no sound effects I ran out of time.

This game was made for a finish that game jam. I joined when there was 3 hours left so I opened up an old project and got to work. It was really stressful to say the least. I will post a video soon about the making of it so check back on this page in a few days if you are interested.

What is the game

That is a good question. It is a complete mess and has a few bugs that I know of so for my sake just ignore them because I will just pretend they were intentional. Anyway, thanks for playing and I hope you worked out how to play the game because I am way too tired to explain it.

Ok goodbye.
